chaphypo33.Description: I often get so happy and energetic that I am almost giddy.

chaphypo32.Description: I am considered to be kind of a "hyper" person.

chaphypo48.Description: A hundred years after I'm dead, my achievements will probably have been forgotten.

chaphypo9.Description: Many people consider me to be amusing but kind of eccentric.

chaphypo11.Description: I am frequently in such high spirits that I can't concentrate on any one thing for too long.

chaphypo13.Description: People often come to me when they need a clever idea.

chaphypo44.Description: I frequently get into moods where I feel very speeded-up and irritable.

chaphypo18.Description: I often have moods where I feel so energetic and optimistic that I feel Icould outperform almost anyone at anything.

chaphypo45.Description: I have often felt happy and irritable at the same time.

chaphypo1.Description: I consider myself to be pretty much an average kind of person.

chaphypo27.Description: I like to have others think of me as a normal kind of person.

chaphypo34.Description: There are so many fields I could succeed in that it seems a shame to have to pick one.

chaphypo29.Description: I have often persuaded groups of friends to do something really adventurous or crazy.

chaphypo4.Description: I think I would make a good nightclub comedian.

chaphypo20.Description: There have often been times when I had such an excess of energy that Ifelt little need to sleep at night.

chaphypo25.Description: When I go to a gathering where I don't know anyone, it usually takes me a while to feel comfortable.

chaphypo40.Description: At social gatherings, I am usually the "life of the party".

chaphypo43.Description: I have often been so excited about an involving project that I didn't care about eating or sleeping.

chaphypo46.Description: I often get into excited moods where it's almost impossible for me to stop talking.

chaphypo10.Description: When I feel an emotion, I usually feel it with extreme intensity.

chaphypo21.Description: My moods do not seem to fluctuate any more than most people's do.

chaphypo28.Description: I frequently write down the thoughts and insights that come to me when Iam thinking especially creatively.

chaphypo42.Description: I seem to have an uncommon ability to persuade and inspire others.

chaphypo41.Description: I do most of my best work during brief periods of intense inspiration.

MeasurementToolMetadata.Description: Eckblad and Chapman's Hypomanic Personality Scale

chaphypo12.Description: I sometimes have felt that nothing can happen to me until I do what I am meant to do in life.

chaphypo17.Description: I am usually in an average sort of mood, not too high and not too low.

chaphypo6.Description: When with groups of people, I usually prefer to let someone else be the center of attention.

chaphypo16.Description: I can't imagine that anyone would ever write a book about my life.

chaphypo24.Description: When I feel very excited and happy, I almost always know the reason why.

chaphypo31.Description: I can usually slow myself down when I want to.

chaphypo26.Description: I think I would make a good actor, because I can play many roles convincingly.

chaphypo2.Description: It would make me nervous to play the clown in front of other people.

chaphypo7.Description: In unfamiliar surroundings, I am often so assertive and sociable that Isurprise myself.

chaphypo37.Description: I seem to be a person whose mood goes up and down easily.

chaphypo35.Description: I often get into moods where I feel like many of the rules of life don't apply to me.

chaphypo14.Description: I am no more self-aware than the majority of people.

chaphypo3.Description: I am frequently so "hyper" that my friends kiddingly ask me what drug I'm taking.

chaphypo22.Description: I very frequently get into moods where I wish I could be everywhere and do everything at once.

chaphypo19.Description: I have such a wide range of interests that I often don't know what to do next.

chaphypo38.Description: I frequently find that my thoughts are racing.

chaphypo30.Description: I would really enjoy being a politician and hitting the campaign trail.

chaphypo39.Description: I am so good at controlling others that it sometimes scares me.

chaphypo36.Description: I find it easy to get others to become sexually interested in me.

chaphypo15.Description: I often feel excited and happy for no apparent reason.

chaphypo23.Description: I expect that someday I will succeed in several different professions.

chaphypo47.Description: I would rather be an ordinary success in life than a spectacular failure.

chaphypo5.Description: Sometimes ideas and insights come to me so fast that I cannot express them all.

chaphypo8.Description: There are often times when I am so restless that it is impossible for me to sit still.
